Title: Relates to imposing requirements on receipt of state funding by certain housing projects in a city with a population of one million or more
Summary: Requires certain housing projects in a city with a population of one million or more to designate a minimum of thirty-two percent of the dwelling units in such project for low income housing to be eligible for state funding.
LawCode: Add ยง77, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to imposing requirements on receipt of state funding by certain housing projects in a city with a population of one million or more
